meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Muzy Huq Jodi Koehn Eric Floyd Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4115.

td.p: Muzy Huq, a freelance graphic artist from Los Angeles, California
Jodi Koehn, an editor from Rockville, Maryland
Eric Floyd, a college student from Calhoun, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,800)

tr.td: THE WHITE HOUSE
GRAMMY-WINNING COMEDY ALBUMS
CELEBRATE THE CENTURY STAMPS
STATE MOTTOES
KISS-AND-TELL
"HOT" STUFF
